text: Water soluble phosphorylated beta-1 to 3-D-glucan ( GP ) was prepared as done before [ 20 ] .
The physicochemical characteristics of GP were determined as reported previously [ 20 , 26 ] .

GP was dissolved in aqueous media , filter-sterilized ( 0.2 mum ) and screened for endotoxin contamination with the Endospecy assay ( Seigakaku , Tokyo , Japan ) , which is specific for endotoxin but does not respond to beta-1 to 3-D-glucans .
